body.p: Benton County Iowa, minister. Kentucky native. Married to Lydia Boggs. Father of Lemuel Stevenson, J. E. Stevenson, A. M. Stevenson, L. B. Stevenson, Mary Stevenson, Fannie Stevenson, Wilbur F. Stevenson, Hiram S. Stevenson, Sidney Stevenson, Henry Stevenson, Evan Stevenson, and Laura Stevenson. Farmer and Methodist minister in Scott County, Kentucky in 1850. Minister in Benton County, Iowa in 1860. Chaplain in the 15th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.). Resigned March 21, 1862. Owned eight enslaved persons in 1850.
